actions.description: The grippli makes one attack with its tongue. If this attack hits, the grippli can make a melee attack using its trident against the same target.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the grippli can't grab another creature.
actions.name: Tongue

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.
actions.name: Trident

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the grippli had advantage on the attack roll.
actions.name: Shortbow

languages: Grippli plus one other language (usually Common, Draconic, or Primordial)
name: Grippli Warrior

specialTraits.description: The grippli can hold its breath for 20 minutes.
specialTraits.name: Hold Breath

specialTraits.description: The grippli can leap 30 feet horizontally or 20 feet vertically from a standing position.
specialTraits.name: Standing Leap
